en.name: Ecemnur Akatmaci
en.description: I am a senior Software Engineering student at Celal Bayar University. To further enhance my skills, I completed a 6-month Full-Stack Web Development training at Workintech. I am continuously improving myself in both front-end and back-end technologies to become a well-rounded developer.
en.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
